sentences.en: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.cn: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

sentences.en: A policeman can compel obedience to the law.
sentences.cn: 一名警察能迫使服从法律.

sentences.en: Do you think you can compel obedience from me?
sentences.cn: 你以为你能逼我服从 吗 ?

sentences.en: His cleverness and skill compel our admiration.
sentences.cn: 他的聪明和技艺博得我们的赞赏.

sentences.en: His courage and skill compel our admiration.
sentences.cn: 他的勇气和技巧使我们都很钦佩.

sentences.en: His performance compelled the audience’s attention .
sentences.cn: 他的表演吸引了观众的注意力。

sentences.en: Investigating power was used to compel the bank to disclose some facts.
sentences.cn: 人们运用侦察权以强迫银行披露某些事实.

sentences.en: Law does not compel a man to do what he is impossible to perform.
sentences.cn: 法律不能强迫人去做不可为之事.

sentences.en: My political belief, my ideals, compel me to veto this bill.
sentences.cn: 我的政治信仰 、 我的理想迫使我否决这个议案.

sentences.en: Rarities are always helped by any device which will rouse curiosity and compel remark.
sentences.cn: 只要上面有能激发好奇心并已让人不得不看的印迹,这种精品总是好卖的.

sentences.en: She could no longer compel her mother's heart to keep silence.
sentences.cn: 她这做母亲的再也忍不住要说几声了.

sentences.en: She could, if she wanted, compel him, through a court of law, to support the child after it was born.
sentences.cn: 如果她愿意，她可以通过法庭强制他在孩子出生以后抚养孩子。

sentences.en: She now will fell compel at that moment to come chase me.
sentences.cn: 那个时候她会感到有压力并且开始来追逐我.

sentences.en: The arguments are founded on facts and compel conviction.
sentences.cn: 这些论点以事实为根据,令人不得不信服.

sentences.en: The law will compel employers to provide health insurance.
sentences.cn: 这项法律将强制雇主提供健康保险。

sentences.en: These facts compel us to act along with our friends and allies.
sentences.cn: 这些事实迫使我们与我们的友邦和盟国共同行动.

sentences.en: We cannot compel you to ( do it ), but we think you should.
sentences.cn: 我们不能强迫你 ( 去做 ), 但认为你应该做.

sentences.en: We should not compel everyone to do the same thing!
sentences.cn: 我们不应该强迫任何人做一样的事情.

words.tran_cn: 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的
强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: to force someone to do something
to force someone to do something
